sourcesContent:
import "./about.scss" export default function About() { return (

About Me (she/her)

As a second-year engineering student, I've been exploring my interests in technology and design in various ways through the courses that my program offers me. From a young age, I've always been interested in the ways that technology has been advancing, how it applies to me and how I can be apart of that change. I began learning how to code at the age of 11 and have decided to pursue software development as a lifelong career.

My interest in technology first started when I began playing video games. Video games were not only a source of entertainment, but they provided me with challenges that required analysis, strategy and teamwork, which is something that I enjoy to this day and is one of the many reasons that I enjoy coding. To me, video games have always provided a sense of comfort and relief from the issues of everyday life and I believe that they have given me valuable skills when it comes to analyzing and strategizing.

I enjoy taking time away from my computer by spending time with my friends and making memories. I try to cherish my years of youth as much as possible and enjoy capturing special moments through videos and pictures. I document things like my travels, skateboarding with my friends, and sometimes just everyday fun. My ultimate goal in life is to live it to its very fullest and I have every intention to do so.

) }
